item.title: How do you put ur site on the web
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

hehe,

    firstly you need to get a free host, if you dont know nay any here is a very good site to start looking - http://www.freewebspace.net/

i would advise getting one with Cpanel or something, it just makes your life a little bit easier. Exspecially if you dont know much. Well onc eyou got that either find the file upload option or upload the files with a ftp program. Aslong as you got an index.html and you uploaded it in the wright directory you should be fine from there.

hope this helps,

solemn wishes.

Read full topic
